description: {"blocks":[{"key":"35gp8","text":"This protocol describes the genetic modification of induced pluripotent cells (iPSCs) using CRISPR-Cas9, including synthesis of gRNA plasmids, transfection, selection of clones, and sequencing of genomic DNA to confirm knockout generation. The steps described in this protocol is based on Skarnes et al. (2019) and Fernandopulle et al. (2018).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8acv6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27qnm","text":"Plate nucleofected cells in geltrex-coated dishes in E8 Flex media containing   Y-27632 (rock inhibitor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnf3p","text":"Select GFP-positive cells by Fluorescence-activated cell sorting (FACS)  post-transfection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e8415","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvk3t","text":"After sorting, plate the cells in Geltrex-coated dish in E8 Flex media containing Y-27632 (rock inhibitor). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"575jg","text":"Replace the media with fresh E8 Flex media the next day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bh9jj","text":"Check wells each day to identify wells with a single colony. Split and expand each clonal well when possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ab1eu","text":"Screen colonies for target protein using immunoblotting or sanger sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14k65","text":"For sanger sequencing, ICE CRISPR analysis tool (https://www.synthego.com/products/bioinformatics/crispr-analysis) was used to analyze the relative contribution of insertions and deletions (INDELS).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":65}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"41584A70E06211EE96760A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.synthego.com/products/bioinformatics/crispr-analysis)"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3l4r1","text":"Expand and freeze KO lines. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
